Hannah hugged Shari, even though it had been two days, she still missed her friend. She noticed Shari's face. "Is everything alright?" Hannah asked confused. "You look like someone died but at the same time look like you just won the lotto."

"The old me is dead," Shari said coldly as she stepped away from Hannah's embrace and walked between the two of you. "And in exchange, I can now do whatever I want." Shari looked at you, her eyes suddenly came alive. "First things first...."
151.title: Shari

1512.content:
"I'm sick of sharing my bed," Shari stated looking at Hannah. "I know Marcus has no where to go but I want my bed to myself again."

"Shari, I know it's been annoying, it has for me too," Hannah tried to assure her friend. "It's too much to ask for someone to sleep on the couch, it's too short, it'll be extremely uncomfortable, even if we took in turns. We've discussed this." Hannah's mouth sealed shut.

"Quiet, Hannah, I'm thinking," Shari's hand gesture signaled for her to shut up. Hannah's eyes went wide as she touched where her lips should've been. "My grandmother taught me magic, she said it'd cost me but I feel better than ever," Shari explained. "You have no idea how much silencing you excites me..." Shari turned to you and squeezed her hand in your direction. You were no longer able to move and could barely breathe. "You know, I was going to get change you into something that didn't require a bed but using magic like this is exhilarating and I'm now tempted to keep you as my plaything and turn Hannah into something instead."

Shari restored Hannah's mouth by relaxing the gesture.

"Shari, please, this isn't you..." Hannah begged.

Shari shivered. "Oooh that begging, it's like an orgasm... I wish my grandmother had taught me magic sooner." Shari squeezed her hand in Hannah's direction and then brought both her hands together. You and Hannah slide across the room until you were both next to each other. "Now let me think..."
1512.title: Three people are too many for this apartment

choices: She tells you about her new found powers
She decides to cast a spell on you while you're sleeping
152.content:
Hannah was your only cousin on your mother's side. She was mischievous and wild spirit. When you were growing up, Hannah often acted as your baby sitter, which is why you were living with her now. She always loved to mess with you, a couple of times she had made you play dress up and she even did your nails and gave you make up. She's the one who told you about the thing that got you into trouble with Tiffany, though you never told your parents it was her.

She had long chocolate brown hair that flowed down her back and over her shoulders. She had slightly darker skin than you and bright green eyes. She was reasonably skinny, though her belly was starting to get bigger with all the drinking and partying she did. You weren't sure if she took any drugs but you wouldn't be surprised if she did.

Living with her had been a challenge. She often forgot you had her bed and would occasionally come home drunk and collapse next to you. If she had come home at all. She also liked to pull minor pranks on both you and Shari, which you'd often get the blame for, not helping with that relationship at all.

Still you couldn't help but look up to and admire Hannah, though a lot of that comes back to your childhood. She had taught you so much (most of it bad) and had a lot of fun with you (a lot of the times at your expense). You'd do anything for Hannah, all she had to do was ask, a shame she stopped asking as she got older.

Though there was something about Hannah than neither you or Shari knew. It was only something that happened recently, Hannah had been partying one night and met the wrong man. Shari had met someone that night and left Hannah alone. Hannah was saved by a strange woman, who decided to teach Hannah magic so she could protect herself in the future. Hannah was now a witch and she was going to use her powers to have some fun.
152.title: Hannah

choices: She casts a spell on you
She casts a spell on herself
1521.content:
It was Sunday morning and you were just getting out of bed. You weren't sure if Hannah or Shari were home as you hadn't heard either of them come in last night and usually they were pretty loud when returning home. You didn't mind when they didn't come back though, it brought you some very rare peace and quiet at least for a couple of hours.

You stepped out into the main area of the apartment and was surprised to see Hannah sitting at the table with a cockroach under a glass in front of her. She seemed to be lost in thought, she didn't even hear you and you quickly noticed how messy she was.

Her hair was a mess and seemed to have some small debris in it, her red dress was torn at the bottom and her shoulder strap was broken. She was missing a shoe and the other shoe had a broken heel. Her dress was also very dirty. "Is everything alright?" you asked as you walked onto the other side of the table, her make up was runny and you tried not to look down at her cleavage as with one of her boobs were almost hanging out. "Did you need me to call the police?" You asked, surmising what might've happened.

"No, no.." Hannah said in a calm voice. "It's alright, nothing happened and the person who did this has been punished." She looked up at you, she seemed to be fine though her eyes looked more empty. "Though if you wanted to do something for me, you could squish this bug. I can't work up the courage to do it." You shrugged and squished the bug without a second thought. "Thanks Marcus, you're the best." Hannah got up off the chair and went to the bathroom to clean herself up, while you discarded the bug's remains.

Thirty minutes later Hannah returned to the dining room looking rather refreshed. "So you'll never believe what happened last night," she said in a more energetic and playful mood. "I was taught real magic..."

"Um... are you sure you're alright?" You asked worried for Hannah's well being.

"I'm fine, in fact let me show you something I can do..."
1521.title: She tells you about her new found powers

153.content:
Across town in an old ran down library the five women met. Ms Darwin, Amy and Tiffany had all received summons by the school librarian, while Hannah and Shari were asked by a customer where they worked.

"Ms Darwin?" Amy asked as she saw her teacher. "What are you doing here?"

"Oh, you're here...?" Tiffany spat at Amy, not impressed to see the girlfriend of your mortal enemy.

"It appears we all got an invite here," Ms Darwin observed.

An old door creaked as two older women stepped through the door marked employees only. "Good the five of you are here," the school librarian greeted the women. It was only then that Ms Darwin, Amy and Tiffany noticed Hannah and Shari standing in the corner.

The five of them followed the women to the back room, where there was an old dusty book, embedded with gems laying on an alter. "For three hundred years our coven has stood, we are the last survivors, we have chosen the five of you to be our successors and so we grant you our power." The two old women grabbed a knife and cut open their hands, placing the palm on the largest gem on the book. The gem started to glow as two women turned to dust. The room lit up with a red glow as the five remaining people were filled with energy.

"What was that...?" Shari asked as the dust of the other too faded completely.

"I think we're witches or something..." Amy looked at her hands feeling the energies flow through them.

"Oh this is going to be so fun. Don't get too attached to Marcus, Amy..." Tiffany warned with a wicked smile.

Hannah paused at the mention of your name and waited to see how the conversation unfolded.

"You do anything to him, Tiffany and I'll turn your friends into toads..." Amy shot back.

"Girls!" Ms Darwin snapped. "Neither of you will be transforming anyone on school grounds while I'm around."

"Could you even stop us?" Tiffany genuinely inquired. "I mean I don't think we can cast spells on each other but could you honestly stop me from turning Marcus into a bug and squishing him?"

"Well no... I don't think so but if I see either of you transforming anyone like that and I'll give you permanent detention." Ms Darwin threatened both of them.

"Wait, you're that Tiffany?" Hannah asked finally speaking up. She knew enough to decide they were talking about you.

"What do you mean that Tiffany?" she shot back.

"Wait are they talking about your cousin?" Shari realized.

"You're Marcus' cousin?" Tiffany asked. "You're not the one who told him to do what he did are you?" Tiffany gave Hannah a death glare. She tried to cast a spell on Hannah but it didn't work. "Damn, I was right..."

"What did you just try to do to me?" Hannah asked as she took a step towards Tiffany.

Shari held Hannah back for a second. "Wait, so this is the girl that, Marcus did the thing to?" Shari clarified. She stepped away from Hannah and joined Tiffany. "I'm with her. Maybe not the squishing part but your cousin is a creep, I'd love to teach him a lesson or two."

Amy walked over to Hannah, joining her side. She was ready to protect you or at least punish those who messed with you.

"Now, girls..." Ms Darwin stepped between the two groups. "We've just become a coven and we're already fighting, over a boy no less." She took the roll of mediator. "We're a family now, so we're going to resolve this. When it comes to casting spells on Marcus..."
153.title: The Coven

choices: You must agree with me on the first choice
You must say yes and no an equal amount of times.
1532.content:
"There are five of us so let us make a contract, for any spell to work on Marcus, three of us must agree to it," Ms Darwin offered, knowing full well she would often be the deciding factor. Two camps had already formed.

"No way," Tiffany refused those conditions. "I'd rather do what I want to him whenever."

"And if you do, your friends will pay," Amy countered.

"We're working out solutions here, girls..." Ms Darwin reminded them. "We'll add the majority rules circumstance for changing anyone we know and love, everyone else is fair game." Ms Darwin offered as a way to protect against retaliation.

"I still don't get to have the fun I want though," Tiffany crossed her arms.

"Killing my cousin isn't fun!" Hannah snapped.

"But turning him into a bug would be..." Shari mused. "Not our fault what might happen to him after that."

"This is why we need to agree," Ms Darwin snapped. "Look, I'm not going to say no to every little wicked idea," she informed Tiffany and Shari. She then turned to Hannah and Amy. "I also promise that I'll make sure whatever the idea is is safe and revertible. In all honesty, while he is one of my better students, I don't really care either way."

"Whatever we decide we'll be bound by it," Amy said, flicking through the first pages of the book. "We can't change our minds later. So I trust Ms Darwin and will agree to the majority rules term."

"If we're bound by it, then I have some conditions if Ms Darwin is going to be the decider the majority of the time," Tiffany offered.

"What is it...?" Ms Darwin asked happy to be getting somewhere
1532.title: The Majority rules

choices: Someone in the appartment building doesn't seem to like Hannah and Shari
Amy has an ex girlfriend she failed to mention.
154.content:
Your life is about to change, not because of your actions but the actions of those around you. You might only witness the witch's curse, dealing with the aftermath or you might be used as ammunition in the witch's revenge.

Hannah and Shari can be obnoxious at times as they were party girls, they loved to drink and listen to loud music and neither of them knew when to shut up. This has caused some issues with a few neighbors and it's possible that one of them might be a witch.

When you first started dating Amy, you knew she was bisexual, what you didn't know is there was a girl she dated before you. This was a few years ago before Amy moved to town.
154.title: Someone with a grudge.

1541.content:
You were in Hannah's room trying to concentrate on your school work, which was rather difficult as Hannah and Shari were having a two person party. They had started with a few drinks then they turned up the music, now they were dancing around the small apartment. You never liked it when they did this and preferred when they went out to party.

"Finally..." you said relieved as the music stopped and the thumps of the girls dancing had settled down.

"I'll get it!" Hannah screamed a little too loud as she opened the front door, which you could now hear someone was pounding on it. "Oh hey.. it's the old hag from down stairs. How's the old country... Mrs Bart...."

"It's Bartkiewicz!" You could hear the old woman spitting the words. "You two girls are being too loud..." her heavy accent made her a little hard to understand. "I warned you, what would happen if you angered me again... no more warnings..."

"Oh yeah.. you said you'd cast a spell on us or something...." Hannah said to Shari.

"Well Mrs Bart... go right ahead. Cast your little spell..." Shari mused.

"It's Bartkiewicz and you will regret that..." the old woman's voice was even more spiteful. Hannah and Shari continued to tease her, when the lights started to flicker. You heard them scream as Mrs Bartkiewicz laughed.

You came out of the room and discovered that Hannah and Shari were now...
1541.title: The old lady down stairs

15411.content:
You entered the main room of the apartment and couldn't believe your eyes. There were two old ladies wearing Hannah and Shari's clothes. One even looked like your grandmother.

They were quite old too, they were in their eighties at least. Their hair which which used to be rich and filled with volume was now thin and completely white. Their breasts sagged as their skin hung loose from their bodies. What used to be well shaped asses now looked deflated.

"What did you do...?" Hannah asked though you could barely understand her as she had no teeth. Shari bumbled around as she could barely see.

"Your days of youth are over..." Mrs Bartkiewicz said.

"What was that?" Hannah asked for clarification even though she was standing right in front of the witch.

"I said, you're old ladies now..." Mrs Bartkiewicz yelled louder.

You looked over to the old hag and saw that she was..
15411.title: Old ladies

154111.content:
"Oh it's the cousin," Mrs Bartkiewicz gave you the same polite wave she had always given you. Though now she looked drop dead gorgeous. She was now the same age as you as she had drained Shari and Hannah's youth and given it to her. "Sorry for disturbing you."

"What did you do...?" You asked, knowing full well what had happened but you still couldn't believe it.

"Something I should've done ages ago," she smirked as she entered the apartment, closing the door behind her. "Do not beg for them, I will not undo this," she warned.

"But you stole their lives..." the girls probably only had a good ten years of life left in them, given their current state.

"It was not much to steal anyway, I've seen plenty of girls like them, they party and party and waste their lives. So they weren't using them."

"But... she's my cousin."

"I said no begging," she warned again. "Unless you want to end up like them."

"What's going to happen to them now?" You changed the subject not wanting your youth stolen as well.

"You can take care of them or send them to nursing home, I don't care," Mrs Bartkiewicz said flatly. "Though before you decide what to do, I'm feeling young and on top of the world, you will come party with me, yes?"
154111.title: Young again

choices: You keep pressing the issue and get turned into a dog yourself
You contact someone to take the dogs
15412.content:
You saw two tiny dogs barking Mrs Bartkiewicz, or more so yapping. Hannah and Shari had been turned into chihuahuas. They looked almost identical and so you weren't sure which was which.

"No dogs in the building," Mrs Bartkiewicz says when she sees you. "This is an animal free apartment, your little bitches need to go," she said with a wicked smile. "Get rid of them this instant!" She slammed the door and left. Hannah and Shari's tails were between their legs and they were shaking, they didn't know what to do.

You looked at the two shaking dogs in disbelief, it was impossible to believe that they were actually Shari and Hannah but they had indeed been turned into dogs and Mrs Bartkiewicz wanted them gone. You hesitated for a split second as you looked down at the dogs and over to the door. You couldn't let her leave them like this or at the very least you couldn't get rid of them.

You opened the front door and chased after Mrs Bartkiewicz as she made it to the elevator and grabbed onto her arm. "Please Mrs Bartkiewicz...." you knew you didn't say her name right but you knew better than to call her Mrs Bart. "You can't leave my cousin like that..." Shari either but for now your main concern was the safety of Hannah.

Mrs Bartkiewicz turned to face you, not impressed that you were holding onto her arm. "Too bad, she and her friend are staying like that, now unless you want to join them, let me go." You quickly released her arm.

"Yes but they are human, to treat them like dogs is..."

"They are dogs!" she interrupted you. "Dogs don't live in this apartment."

"But I can't just get rid of them... I don't know where to send them..." you pleaded.

"Not my problem, I warned them plenty of times to change their ways... they did no listen, so now they must go." She stepped into the elevator. "Find a place for them to go now! Before you get kicked out for having dogs." The elevator door began to close, leaving you only seconds to act
15412.title: Dogs

1543.content:
Tiffany's rise to popularity and general attitude has made her many enemies, only one of them just so happens to be a witch. It's common knowledge Tiffany doesn't like you, in fact she seems to despise you, so what better way to make Tiffany suffer by involving you in some way.

While you love Ms Darwin, not everyone does. She can be kind to students like you, those who pay attention to her 'lessons' but she can be harsh on those who muck around and don't pay attention. Of course then there's the fact that you're not the only student to form a crush on her and that has upset their girlfriends. So what happens when a witch returns to school with a grudge against Ms Darwin and notices your infatuation?
1543.title: More Options

155.content:
Sometimes you don't know who could be a witch or what they might do with there powers. In this case it's someone you've never interacted with before and they decide to use their powers on you or one of the other characters for seemingly no reason at all.

Warlocks are also a thing though they are extremely rare, still who knows you might somehow become one. It's unknown as to why warlocks are rare though, some say it's because the things that grant powers prefer to give it to women, others say the powers are given equally and it just turn the men into women. Either way you're going to find out when you're given the power to change the world around you.
155.title: More options

choices: It comes when you are scolded by Shari
It comes when you go to Biology
1552.content:
You've had a pretty lousy day today. It first started off with Shari having a go at you over something trivial this time, something about accidentally taking her food, which you're pretty sure was on your cousin's shelf in the fridge.

Because of that you were late to getting the bus and got to school late, which made you miss the start of your Biology exam. Thankfully Ms Darwin gave you a second chance to do it, though you were given less time and missed out on your lunch break.

As you missed out on your lunch break you didn't get to meet up with Amy. She seemed pretty angry at you when you tried to apologize later, though she didn't say why. Though from the evil smile you got from Tiffany, she clearly had something to do with it.

When you got home at the end of the day, you wanted to lay down and went straight to Hannah's room, only she was in there getting changed, and once again you saw her topless. This lead to yet another berating.

Once Hannah was dressed and had gone out for the evening, you finally laid down on the bed and closed your eyes, wishing you could start the day over again.

'Very well...' you heard something in your mind say. 'I will see you at some point earlier today.'

You didn't say anything to the voice, thinking it was your overactive imagination getting the better of you.

When you woke up a sense of déjà vu washed over you, you could've sworn yesterday was Friday, though today was Friday. You also got the sense that you had an important meeting today, though you couldn't remember where or when it would take place. You thought it might've had something to do with your biology exam, but that wasn't it.

Little did you know there was an entity watching you, as you were forced to repeat the day as you did before, the only difference was you'd be meeting this entity at some point during the day where you had a bad interaction.
1552.title: Gaining powers

15521.content:
"Did you grab my last chocolate bar?" Shari accused you as you finished swallowing. She grabbed you by the wrist and dragged you over to the fridge. "How many times do I need to tell you, this is my shelf and that's yours and Hannah's!"

You saw the shelves she was pointing at and while you did just eat a chocolate bar it wasn't on the shelf she claimed was hers. "But I..."

"No buts... I'm sick of this arrangement, I'm sick of you..." She began to ramble on. You noticed the time and headed for the door. "I'm not done talking to yet!" Shair grabbed your arm again. "You don't respect boundaries, you don't respect that this is our home. Would it kill you to knock when entering the bathroom, or to put down the toilet seat?" She was now rambling about previous issues. "You're nothing but a pest and the sooner you're gone the better."

'Please stop talking... I'm going to be late,' you thought to yourself as everything went dark, except for you and Shari. You were both in some kind of void with no light. Though she was frozen in place.

"Hello Marcus," a voice said from behind you and when you turned around you saw a figure with a crimson robe. Shadow covered their face and the robes hid their body shape, you couldn't tell if this was a man or woman speaking to you either. "I told you we'd meet today."

"Who... are you... what do you want?" You asked out loud but your mouth didn't move.

"It doesn't matter who I am, just what I'm going to offer you. I've noticed something interesting about you Marcus, you are surrounded by women you find attractive and they all treat you quite poorly."

"Amy and Hannah aren't like..." the figure raised its hand to silence you.

"Hannah yells at you just as much as this one and complains about you behind your back. If she could, she'd get rid of you just as quickly. And Amy, she's not your girlfriend, in fact you're barely friends. If I let this day go on like it was supposed to, you two wouldn't be together by the end." You saw a brief memory of Amy giving you the cold shoulder.

"So what do you want with me then?" You asked.

"It's not what I want with you, it's what I want to give you. I am going to offer you the power to change reality by altering those around you. With this power no one will dare mess with you again." The entity reached for your shoulder with a gloved hand. "What say you, boy?"
15521.title: Scolded by Shari

choices: You have to be a woman
Shari gets the power as well
155211.content:
"Yes, give me this power...." you say almost hypnotized as the thoughts of what you could do rush through your head.

The entity laughed. "You humans never say no to power do you?" It asked rhetorically. "As I promised this power is yours, however like all things there is a catch."

You frown for a moment, you knew this was too good to be true. "Of course there is... I don't suppose it's too late to say no."

"It is actually, you wanted the power so now you need to live with the consequences, it's not that bad though, it's only...."
155211.title: You say yes

choices: Shari is now a black cat
1552111.content:
"I do not create warlocks, I create witches," the entity tells you as you feel your body begin to change.

It feels like you were kicked in the groin at full force as your testicles retreat into your body and your genitals change into the female reproductive system. Your bones crack as your hips widen and your features change. You feel the mounds of flesh growing from your chest as you lose your facial hair and the rest of you body hair thins out on your arm and legs, while leaving your back and chest. The hair on your head stays the same length though.

"What did you do to me?" You ask in a voice that sounds close to your mother's as you stand up and investigate the changes.

"I have turned you into a witch," the entity states. "You now have the power to change people as you desire and the knowledge to cast curses, hexes and brew potions." It stated plainly. "Though now your soul is damned but you now have the means to live longer and even be resurrected. Careful with the spells you cast though, vile magic tends to reflect outwardly."

With that warning the entity was gone and time resumed.
1552111.title: You have to be a woman

1552113.content:
"All power must have a source," the entity tells you. "To be a witch or warlock is no different. Though since I am a generous being I am going to give you a choice for what your power source will be."

The entity made a table appear before you and on it were three items, a book, a clear gemstone and a parchment. "I can give you this spell book, its pages are limited and so too will the spells you can cast. Also if the book were to fall into the wrong hands, you would lose access to it," the entity explained as it gestured at the box.

"This is a soul stone, it'll give you the powers you asked for at the cost of a soul. Souls don't last long on the mortal plane though and so a hundred years is its limits, take away the current age of the soul. Every spell cast will take away one year. You will also stop aging while it is in your possession, as the soul in the stone will age instead." While you couldn't see the entity's eyes you knew it was glancing at Shari. "To take this one requires an immediate sacrifice."

It then looked down at the parchment. "This one is simple, you sign your soul over to me, you have the powers to do as you like but you must also do what I like. This will give you the most amount of power." You knew the entity wasn't telling you everything about that option.

"What if I don't like the sounds of either one of these?" You inquired.

"You have already agreed to take the power so you must choose, if you do not, I will chose for you," as the entity said that you felt your hand move towards the table.

You fought for control over it and won, though only because the entity let you. You had no choice now, you'd have to pick one of these either by your choice or the entity's.
1552113.title: Power isn't unlimited

choices: The entity traps you in a time loop
The entity gives Shari the power instead
Nothing happens, the Entity never bothers you again.
155212.content:
"No, I'm not going to fall for this, it has to be a trick," you tell the entity.

You felt the entity give you a wicked grin. "That was smart, but also foolish," it stated with amusement. "Power always comes at a cost, so you have avoided paying the toll. However I have power and by refusing me, you risked suffering my wrath. For now though, I am amused and I shall respect your choice and leave."

The world grew light again and Shari unfroze. She blinked for a second, as she was sure something strange just happened. "What are you still doing here? I told you to leave."

You headed for the door, wondering if you made the right choice and if you'll see the entity again.
155212.title: You say no

choices: You are forced to live the day as it happened.
1552121.content:
You weren't aware of the first time you experienced this day, besides from the memory flash the Entity had shown you of you and Amy. You didn't know what had lead to that until you experienced it again.

The day played out as it did before, you are late to school, you miss out on lunch trying to catch up on your biology exam, you didn't meet up with Amy, Amy ignores you, Tiffany seems to be behind it.

You catch Hannah half dressed, even though her room was yours at the moment. You fall asleep and wake up the next day.

Only when you wake up the date on your phone hadn't changed. Only the time.

This time you were aware of the repeating day and...
1552121.title: The entity traps you in a time loop

choices: After three hundred and sixty-five repeats, the entity returns
You're still in the timeloop ten years later and you've gotten older.
15521211.content:
You walk out to the fridge, hungry for food. You find the chocolate bar, on Hannah's shelf. While you tell yourself not to grab it, something forces you to anyway.

Once again Shari yells at you for eating her food, though you know you're right this time. It was on Hannah's shelf. You play a back seat to your own body as you can't help but to react the day you did before. You get to school late, you miss your Biology exam and do it during your lunch break.

When you see Amy, she's angry at you and Tiffany is delighted. You go back home and find Hannah topless. You go to sleep and repeat the day again and again... and again...

You've gone through this day so many times, you can repeat every word you heard in your head. After that you turn your focus too how many steps you take. You are a prisoner in your own head repeating the day again and again.

You wish for release from this torment...
15521211.title: You are forced to live the day as it happened.

155212113.content:
You live the same day over and over again for the rest of eternity. To keep your mind active you begin to take note of different details. You learn every breath you took that day, every step you took, everyone you saw. The amount of words spoken, the hairs on you Shari's hair. Every small and tiny detail, you know off by heart.

Over a thousand years you live this day, you can't even remember your mother's faces anymore. You even forget all the details about your cousin, Tiffany, Shari and others outside the event of the day. You forget everyone and everything that's not in this day. All relationships forgotten.

You now hate Shari for yelling at the wrong thing. You hate your Biology teacher for making you miss lunch, you hate Amy for giving you the cold shoulder and you don't even know who Tiffany is. Hannah you forgot was your cousin and so you only focused on the excitement of seeing her topless before she yells at you too.

If the time loop were to end now, you would be broken beyond repair
155212113.title: It never comes

1552121131.content:
Now that you have forgotten your old life completely and developed grudges against those you encounter during this day on repeat, the entity finally returns to you.

"Ready to accept my gift now? You've already paid the price," it tells you as you get up in the morning.

You froze unable to process your daily routine of a thousand years has been interrupted by this being. It waited patiently until you were ready. "What powers?" You ask, speaking your own words for the first time in forever. You almost forgot you had to actually tell your body to talk.

"The powers to do anything you want. I offered them to you, several life times ago but you refused. Now I make the offer once more. Will you accept."

You had been trapped for so long it was nice to be free and now you could get back at those people you always encounter. There was an easy answer to this question. "Yes, give me the power."

"I thought you'd say that," the entity smiles and vanishes.

You stood there for a moment, then remembered you had to walk. After spending a thousand years living this day it was hard to break the habit so you went to the fridge and grabbed the chocolate. Like always Shari comes up to you and starts yelling. This time however you are able to do something.
1552121131.title: Now the enitity returns

choices: There were people to punish at school
See what happens if you mess with Shari while she's stuck in this loop.

info.brief_description: Someone in your life is a Witch.
info.description:
I created this item as I like witches as an antagonist for transformations, they can be cruel and uncaring or playful and mean spirited. I am someone with a lot of ideas and find many branching ideas in my head, which is why I created it as an interactive. Sometimes I have an idea of a different outcome though don't always know where it'll lead so I do encourage people to add to this story.

This story is about a young man finding out a woman in his life is a witch. This discovery leads to an interesting turn of events as he is subjected to all sorts of charms and transformations.

The witches in this story don't have unlimited power and aren't limited to women, so there might be a few warlocks running around. Their powers aren't unlimited as there's a power source that gives them their abilities, this can be multiple things, from a spell book to a magic gem or making a deal with a powerful entity, using these powers can come with draw backs however, like rapid aging or their soul being dammed. A witch can also share a power source with another witch, this too can come with draw backs.

The types of transformations seen in this story can be animals, inanimate objects, gender changes, body swaps, body modifications, age manipulation, petrification. Other spells such as time manipulation and enthrallment as well as anything else you'd expect from a witch is fine.

Rules
Death of any of the characters are fine, there's some nasty magic out there after all. Though that doesn't mean the story has to end, new victims can be discovered and some witches can reverse death with the right spells.

When dealing with characters under the age of 18, be mindful how you treat them, I will not tolerate any nudity or sex and these chapters will be deleted. I'd rather not have anyone under age but that does remove the ability for age regression and some times witches can be mean to children.

Be mindful of other people when writing, leaving as many options available as possible. If you can only add two paths I'd rather you do 'more options' as the second choice allowing for others to add their own ideas. On that note be careful how long you make your chapters, they shouldn't be too short however they should also leave room for choice. So don't write too many transformations or actions in a single chapter where another choice was available.

I am impulsive and do change my mind often so do except to see the occasional change in the structure of the interactive or some of my additions being edited. I will try not to delete chapters and if an idea I thought of gets taken I will use the more options or edit the choices so both out ideas for that choice can be expressed. (On that note, if anyone wanted to add to a particular option that was taken feel free to repeat that choice with your own idea).
